languages.text: "Священн{mf|ый|ая} цар{mf|ь|ица}, что избавил{mf||а} ковчег от проклятия твоего существования, Немо, почтил{mf||а} нас визитом". {n}Искаженный череп в руках Кибеллы сверкает начищенной бледностью кости. В пустых глазницах застыл вопрос, ответ на который возможно узнать, лишь познав смерть.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
вход для активного Obj_TalkToKibellah ИЛИ выполненного Q1
+ Q2 Not Completed

вход для активного Obj_TalkToKibellah ИЛИ выполненного Q1

languages.text: "Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. The one who delivered this ark from the curse of your existence." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Священн{mf|ый|ая} цар{mf|ь|ица}, что избавил{mf||а} ковчег от проклятия твоего существования, Немо, почтил{mf||а} нас визитом". {n}Искаженный череп в руках Кибеллы сверкает начищенной бледностью кости. В пустых глазницах застыл вопрос, ответ на который возможно узнать, лишь познав смерть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. The one who delivered this ark from the curse of your existence." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}

"Pay heed, Nemo. Our blessed {mf|lord|lady}, {mf|he|she} who rid the ark of the curse of your existence, has graced us with a visit." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question, the answer to which can only be learned by one who has come to know death.{/n}

Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}

"Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. The one who delivered this ark from the curse of your existence." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}

languages.text: «Pon atención, Nemo. {mf|Nuestro bendito|Nuestra bendita} Domin nos honra con su visita. Fue {mf|él|ella} quien salvó esta arca del azote de tu existencia». {n}Kibellah sostiene un cráneo deforme que ha sido bruñido hasta adquirir un lustre pálido. Sus cuencas vacías plantean un interrogante que solo la muerte puede responder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. The one who delivered this ark from the curse of your existence." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pon atención, Nemo. {mf|Nuestro bendito|Nuestra bendita} Domin nos honra con su visita. Fue {mf|él|ella} quien salvó esta arca del azote de tu existencia». {n}Kibellah sostiene un cráneo deforme que ha sido bruñido hasta adquirir un lustre pálido. Sus cuencas vacías plantean un interrogante que solo la muerte puede responder.{/n}

languages.text: 「気を付けて、ネモ。祝福されしドミンが私たちを訪れた。彼の方こそが、あなたの存在という呪いからこの箱舟を解き放った方よ」{n}キベラの手の中にある異形の頭蓋骨は、磨かれて青白い光沢を帯びている。その空っぽの眼窩は、死の中でしか答えられない問いを投げている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. The one who delivered this ark from the curse of your existence." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「気を付けて、ネモ。祝福されしドミンが私たちを訪れた。彼の方こそが、あなたの存在という呪いからこの箱舟を解き放った方よ」{n}キベラの手の中にある異形の頭蓋骨は、磨かれて青白い光沢を帯びている。その空っぽの眼窩は、死の中でしか答えられない問いを投げている。{/n}

languages.text: “当心点，涅墨，我们尊敬的秘者特地前来见我们了。秘者必将拯救这艘圣船，让它远离你的诅咒。”{n}绮贝菈手中畸形的头骨经过了打磨，散发着亮白色的光泽，空洞的眼窝仿佛在询问着只有死后才能回答的问题。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. The one who delivered this ark from the curse of your existence." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当心点，涅墨，我们尊敬的秘者特地前来见我们了。秘者必将拯救这艘圣船，让它远离你的诅咒。”{n}绮贝菈手中畸形的头骨经过了打磨，散发着亮白色的光泽，空洞的眼窝仿佛在询问着只有死后才能回答的问题。{/n}

languages.text: "Vorsicht, Nemo! {mf|Unser gesegneter|Unsere gesegnete} Domin beehrt uns mit einem Besuch. {mf|Er|Sie} hat diese Arche aus dem Fluch Eurer Existenz geholt." {n}Der missgestaltete Schädel in Kibellahs Händen wurde poliert und schimmert nun blass. Seine leeren Augenhöhlen stellen eine Frage, die nur im Tod beantwortet werden kann.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. The one who delivered this ark from the curse of your existence." {n}The malformed skull in Kibellah's hands has been polished to a pale sheen. Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vorsicht, Nemo! {mf|Unser gesegneter|Unsere gesegnete} Domin beehrt uns mit einem Besuch. {mf|Er|Sie} hat diese Arche aus dem Fluch Eurer Existenz geholt." {n}Der missgestaltete Schädel in Kibellahs Händen wurde poliert und schimmert nun blass. Seine leeren Augenhöhlen stellen eine Frage, die nur im Tod beantwortet werden kann.{/n}

languages.text: « Tu as vu ça, Némo ? Notre vénérable Domin nous fait l'honneur de nous rendre visite. C'est {mf|lui|elle} qui a délivré cette arche de la malédiction de ton existence. » {n}Entre les mains de Kibellah, la surface polie du crâne mal formé luit faiblement. Ses orbites vides semblent poser une question à laquelle seule la mort peut répondre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Take heed, Nemo. Our blessed Domin honours us with a visit. languages.text: "Aman dikkat Nemo. Mübarek Dominimiz, ziyaretimize gelip şeref vermiş. Bu arkı da senin varlığının lanetinden o kurtarmıştı." {n}Kibellah'nın ellerindeki şekilsiz kafatası, rengi solana kadar cilalanmış. Boş göz çukurlarıyla sadece ölülerin yanıtlayabileceği bir soru yöneltiyor.{/n}

Its empty eye sockets pose a question that can only be answered in death.{/n}
